thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Justin
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Justin

author: Justin
title: Justin
text:
We did our research and this was by far the cheapest available option. The car wasn't branded in any way, wasn't brand new and had lots of scratches, but I consider this a positive as it didn't stand out as a rental and we were less nervous driving/ parking than a new immaculate vehicle.
Otherwise the car was perfect and gave us no trouble whatsoever over our 2,000km plus journey.
Collection and drop off were easy too. Make sure to keep your docket indicating where the existing scratches are!!
